Description

e2 application behavior.

e2 applications combine OTP applications and the top level supervisor into one construct, though each is implemented as a separate module.

Refer to e2 application documentation for more details.

Function Index

start_dependencies/1Start an application's dependencies.
start_with_dependencies/1Start an application along with its dependencies.
